items.content: SK Hynix Plans to Invest $13 Billion in New Chip Packaging Plant - SK Hynix Inc. plans to spend 19 trillion won ($12.9 billion) building a new advanced chip packaging facility, initiating a big expansion in anticipation of AI demand.
